resources.string: Antivirus does not make you more secure, they generally make you much less secure by greatly increasing the attack surface.
If your device reboots, or a test hangs, the device is likely vulnerable, but our testing cant determine this with certainty.
The security of the device changes overtime, make sure you run periodically scans.
Sharing the tests results will help to increase the knowledge about the android devices that contains security issues.

Do you want automatically share the scan results for research purpose? The device information collected does not contains unique identifiers or private information. Nothing related to your Google (or any other) account is collected.
Start the scan to get the results
An existing vulnerability test has been updated
A new update is available (version %s). Do you want to update to the latest version?
It was not possible to check for updates. Please try again later.

Some parts of the vulnerability descriptions and impact information are reproduced from work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

A new update is available for VTS for Android, open the app and check for updates to download the latest version.
